title: RYAN RUDMAN
intro: Technologies come & go but it is my skill of being able to understand, reason and adapt to change that is steadfast.
subIntro: It’s not necessarily how much you know, but how quickly you can become proficient in what you don’t know that is a determining factor of sustainability. In the constantly changing world of web technologies a solid understanding of core concepts & the desire to keep learning is what keeps me relevant.
rolesIntro: Of course, knowing the tools of the trade is still important and I am very capable with many of the current technologies. My considerable professional experience has helped me hone my technical skills and given me the ability to adapt quickly to rapidly changing environments and requirements.
roles: Developing and maintaining responsive & efficient user interfaces.
Collaborating with the project management and design teams to convert concepts and visual designs into working implementations.
Making tech stack decisions; choosing the 'best' (not always the latest) technologies for the project and using them to create intuitive experiences
Working together with back-end teams and other stakeholders to ensure seamless integration.
Providing estimated timings for the implemention of new projects and work streams.
Working within tight time constraints and ensuring project delivery.
Working in distributed teams in a remote capacity.
